component.name: Pear Desktop
component.summary: A desktop application for YouTube Music with enhanced features

description.p: Pear Desktop is a cross-platform desktop application for YouTube Music, offering enhanced features through a plugin system. It provides a better user experience with additional functionality not available in the web version.

The application includes a plugin system that allows users to extend functionality, customize the interface, and add features that enhance the YouTube Music experience beyond what's available in the standard web interface.
